Package com.eventmaster.backend.services

Class OrganisationService

java.lang.Object
com.eventmaster.backend.services.OrganisationService
@Service public class OrganisationService extends Object
A class which receives and processes the requests of the SysAdminController.
Author:
Fabian Unger, Fabian Eilber
